actions.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

actions.text: Reported by the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries. H. Rept. 103-203.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 114.
Mr. Studds moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 476 ordered to be reported.

official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the State of Ohio the Senecaville National Fish Hatchery.

summary.text: Authorizes the conveyance, without reimbursement, of all U.S. interest in the Senecaville National Fish Hatchery to the State of Ohio solely for the Ohio fishery resources management program.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the State of Ohio the Senecaville National Fish Hatchery.
